mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
${database.schema}incasso_rid (NR_ANNO,NR_MESE,ID_RID,TX_INTESTATARIO,IM_RICHIESTO,CD_ABI,CD_CAB,NR_CONTO, CD_FISC,ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID,ID_RID_ESITO,DT_VALUTA,CD_IBAN)
SELECT #{anno},#{mese},RID.ID_RID,RID.TX_INTESTATARIO,SUM(IM_RATA) AS IMPORTO,RID.CD_ABI,RID.CD_CAB,RID.NR_CONTO, RID.CD_FISC,#{idTipoIncassoRid},50010,#{dtValuta}, upper(concat(CD_NAZIONE,lpad(NR_CIN_EUROPEO,2,'0'),NR_CIN,lpad(CD_ABI,5,'0'),lpad(CD_CAB,5,'0'),lpad(replace(NR_CONTO,'.',''),12,'0')))
FROM ${database.schema}RATEIZZAZIONE R JOIN ${database.schema}TESSERA T ON T.ID_TESSERA=R.ID_TESSERA JOIN ${database.schema}RID ON RID.ID_RID=T.ID_RID
WHERE R.ID_FLUSSO_ADDEBITO IS NULL AND R.NR_ANNO=#{anno} AND R.ID_RATA IN (SELECT ID_RATA FROM RATA WHERE ID_TIPO_MESE=#{mese})
GROUP BY RID.ID_RID,RID.TX_INTESTATARIO,RID.CD_ABI,RID.CD_CAB,RID.NR_CONTO
mapper.select: SELECT ID_FLUSSO_ADDEBITO as idFlussoAddebito, FR.NR_ANNO as nrAnno, FR.NR_MESE as nrMese, ID_RID as idRid, TX_INTESTATARIO as txIntestatario, fr.DT_VALUTA as dtValuta, DT_ESITO as dtEsito, IM_RICHIESTO as imRichiesto, IR.CD_IBAN as cdIban, CD_ABI as cdAbi, CD_CAB as cdCab, NR_CONTO as nrConto, ID_RID_ESITO as idRidEsito, CD_FISC as cdFisc, TX_INDIRIZZO as txIndirizzo, CD_CAP as cdCap, TX_COMUNE as dsComune, CD_PROV as cdProv, FR.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID as idTipoIncassoRid, TX_RIF_DEBITO as txRifDebito, DS_CAUSALE AS dsCausaleRid FROM ${database.schema}incasso_rid IR JOIN ${database.schema}flusso_incasso_rid FR ON (FR.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID=IR.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID AND FR.NR_MESE=IR.NR_MESE AND FR.NR_ANNO=IR.NR_ANNO) JOIN ${database.schema}tipo_incasso_rid TI ON FR.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID=TI.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID AND FR.ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID= #{idTipoIncassoRid} AND FR.NR_MESE= #{mese} AND FR.NR_ANNO= #{anno}
mapper.update: UPDATE ${database.schema}inncasso_rid SET ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID=50010 WHERE ID_TIPO_INCASSO_RID IS NULL
mapper.delete: delete from ${database.schema}flusso_incasso_rid where nr_anno=#{anno} and nr_mese=#{mese} and id_tipo_incasso_rid=#{idTipoIncassoRid}
mapper.select: select tx_nome_flusso_file from ${database.schema}flusso_incasso_rid where nr_anno=#{anno} and nr_mese=#{mese} and id_tipo_incasso_rid=#{idTipoIncassoRid}
SELECT ID_RID_ESITO as cdCausale, DS_RID_ESITO as dsCausale, ID_STATO_RID_SUCC as idStatoRidSucc, ID_TIPO_STATO_RATA_SUCC as idStatoRataSucc FROM ${database.schema}tipo_rid_esito
